Name: Bam Boa
Review Text: Super cool atmosphere on the Amstel with delicious food! We got the ceviche, salad, and Korean bbq bites. Lots of gluten free, dairy free, and vegan options, which are all labeled on the menu. Will be back!

Review Text: Lovely and bright place with creative decor and - most of all - delicious food. I've had a fresh salad and truffled fries - yummy!

Name: Bam Boa
Review Text: Cute place but food is average. Service was a but lacking, but could be due to shortage of staff.

Name: Bam Boa
Review Text: The food, location and service were excellent. There could be better communication - on the website or menu - about the size of the food portions though. They are quite small. You may need to order at least three items to feel satisfied (dinner meal).

Name: Bam Boa
Review Text: Cosy atmosphere which is created by the well curated interior and vibes. The food is good to share so that you can explore all options possible on the menu. This place is vegan friendly.

Name: Bam Boa

Name: Bam Boa
Review Text: Good place, good food nice atmosphere. If you're going on a sunny Saturday expect long lines. Other than that its great.
